subject: Suits and Litigation
Football
Sports Injuries
Libel and Slander
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. filed a grievance with the players’ union asking Saints linebacker Jonathan Vilma to drop his defamation lawsuit against Commissioner Roger Goodell.
snippet: The N.F.L. filed a grievance with the players’ union asking Saints linebacker Jonathan Vilma to drop his defamation lawsuit against Commissioner Roger Goodell.
